data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=JRkP4ESxoYAQ7kNvgHzBMdL&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAuQZdsK-UXp0YfnOujJgAek-cdNzvUcAK-pijdxjV6Fw&oe=666ECD1C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Vq2HwPz8VuYQ7kNvgFPDU4x&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBYpMc7p_SmoSx64ZDu018u8HFqdPl0j7yGvSbp4OpBrA&oe=666ED6A4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=xHrDovCfMYEQ7kNvgG6I3nU&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCom0pWAGze6tyXBVSJktSiXdea3ymNP-rh42_Juv1Hjw&oe=666EBE07)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=lamfKKwDYk0Q7kNvgHCfYLO&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCHIUYgfSiFiyhQVyqLuX7goTmn4H-A54_ZUDO7k90tzw&oe=666EB0E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=YztkniJs3bIQ7kNvgH2LhWE&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBpQrwVMrlhjgCdtbJM5kVva58fkNyl18lp5AhfdnVpwQ&oe=666EDD58)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Ow24Pbc1XTcQ7kNvgGScee4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDLWN1BOETaXBKB5Cp32L45gouxaPVrEio4mb_Bki9tpg&oe=666ED9D9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=8G2v1us__58Q7kNvgH7zPij&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYACAPJ5-_B-v0KLHf3Y2vvxdg2-Gg30wniiF8nIoYk2fA&oe=666EBFF0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=wCOYSfi2AcUQ7kNvgFG0Ap7&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAXxrPQ4RMT7RHe3GLMkNAYx-e2OjheZ4Z9aPM166NCHA&oe=666EAA6A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BVVzFSNcGiMQ7kNvgGSb8QW&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD_7LrEvS7C_F1aOApa3fy2IW5d0h1bwmpLN_-_NZI45w&oe=666EBE17)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=_s6IV6yaLEgQ7kNvgEVJT47&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYClOgBT_hKjdxzD_N-qu__ZLmsHc0_4Ax15HcDv3A7q3w&oe=666ED98C)
